website_summaries.verdict: People who would give the Ontario Mid Waterproof a shot can expect to experience insane amounts of comfort and heaps of style. Hikers who would invest in this true-to-size Merrell piece are also likely to be mind-blown by its stellar grip performance on the trail.It is just a shame, however, that this incredibly lightweight hiking boot might be too restrictive widthwise for some. To sum up, minus its lone misstep, the Merrell Ontario Mid Waterproof is a stunning footgear that goes beyond expectations in both function and form.
pros: Comfort-wise, the Merrell Ontario Mid Waterproof has given a very good impression on almost everyone who reviewed it
This hiker has floored many owners, including a vlogger, with its astonishing grip over rough terrain
The Ontario Mid Waterproof was commended by several wearers for its jaw-dropping looks
Some verified purchasers couldn’t help but praise the surprising lightness of this watertight hiking boot
Its superbly supportive ankle zone impresses about a handful of users
An expert applauds the Merrell Ontario Mid Waterproof’s amazing flexibility
The shoe’s almost non-existent break-in period floors a small percentage of hiking enthusiasts
A couple of patrons rave about the boot’s fantastic protectiveness against moisture
cons: Several consumers find the Ontario Mid Waterproof’s width unflatteringly too narrow

customer_reviews.title: These boots feel and function at least as good as they look.
customer_reviews.text: I’m reporting my experience as a rheumatoid arthritis patient with serious damage to the joints of my feet. As a result the nerves are also damaged which has led to neuropathy in both feet up to the knees. I’m always looking for good boots/shoes that are both good for walking and some light hiking. If they look good too that’s a bonus! That means I’ll enjoy wearing them all the time. And lets face it. These boots look great and for my pitifully crippled and painful feet they feel as good as they look!
customer_reviews.author: JM Adams

customer_reviews.title: Question with the Purchased Item
customer_reviews.text: The size fit and look OK. Though I am very curious, why black marker is on both sides(QR code) of the pair? Serious problems with the product?
customer_reviews.author: Hiker L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My typical size for a hiking boot/shoe is a size 9. Bought these in a size 9 and was not dissapointed. For me, it was true to size and was extremely comfortable from the get go. I've heard from others to go half a size up since Merrell boots tend to run narrow. I don't have narrow feet, but the boots felt comfortable from side to side and had no issues what soever. This is my first pair of Merrell boots so I can't comment on the durability or how long they'll last. They are however awesome looking boots and REALLY comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Desland

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and suitable for a wide foot, just get a half size larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: My spouse was looking for a hiking boot that would fit his wide feet but we couldn't find any in wide sizes. We chose this boot in a half size larger than his normal shoe size and it fit perfectly. It didn't pinch as other boots did. The boot was super comfortable right away and didn't much break-in.
customer_reviews.author: Sera

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable value
customer_reviews.text: Quality and look are great. I wear a 10.5 in running shoe and 11 in boot. These size 11 fit perfectly. Been walking miles around London and they are very comfortable on the cobbles and pavement. I’m sure they will be fine off-road. I would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juuussssst Riiiiiight!
customer_reviews.text: Well i had a need for a nice durable and overall confortable. I live in a mountainous region of northern california so hiking is just what we do. Just arrived this morning and strapped em on and wore them for the rest of the today. I did apply a good coating of obenaufs boot oil which soaked right in and made the leather a little more workable. But comfortable from the get go. Not a thing bad to say after day 1. Havent even put in a nice insole yet. Will be back to update in a couple weeks and hopefully still be pumped a about having these merrell boots!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These Merrell hiking boots are very light fit well You haven’t tested the water proof feature yet but all my prior Merrell waterproof boots and shoes were so I have no reason to doubt these.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Efthyvoulou

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these boots for a trip to Macau Picchu during the raining season. It rained cats and dogs the first day and the boots were completely waterproof. The traction on the wet rocks was outstanding. The comfort was like wearing my favorite sneakers, and they are very light in weight. Outstanding pair of boots and if I could rate them higher than 5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband to wear to work. Great quality and very attractive
customer_reviews.author: KES

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from the picture I thought they would be thicker but they are more like a sneaker hiker I am no everyday mountain hiker but I feel they will hold up these are my third pair of merrells love merrels
customer_reviews.author: Karp3112

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight pair of hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: One of the lightest weight pair of hiking boots I have ever owned. Very comfortable and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Williamson

customer_reviews.title: delighted
customer_reviews.text: Picked these shoes for my spouse who has a work trip scheduled for a snowy area. They fit beautifully, look good and have great traction.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Opaka

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I now have three pair of these. Totally waterproof and comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jackmae

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Merrell's just fit so perfect right out of the box. These are light weight. Fairly warm. Good traction. Need more time for a comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: MrCrewsn

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made boot
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking boot. Replaced an older set of boots that I have worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this boots. This is the third purchase of this boot, I have severe arthritis in my feet with screws, and I overpronate , the high top helps me, this is one most comfortable boot I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.author: cheryl pawloski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Will update in the future on how this product hold up in 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Cogswheel

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat Merrell I have about 5 pair and they all feel good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bailey

customer_reviews.title: beautiful boots, a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are great but run a little narrow for my foot. I returned them. I got the Merrell Erie instead, which has a more rounded toe box.
customer_reviews.author: E. T.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of merrells and they make amazing products!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Buy one size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 40.5-41 I bought 41.5UK and it’s small on my feet. I can’t say anything about the quality because i just get the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: haig

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style in one.
customer_reviews.text: These boots feel amazing. As if you were wearing your normal every day broken in shoes. Feet don’t sweat, well ventilated and waterproof. No need to break in, grip to ground well and the look it outstanding. Would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Almonimymoni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this shoes. He say they are Confortable
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: True fit with great performance
customer_reviews.text: Another solid hiking boot by Merrell. They fit true, according to their sizing. I added a few coats of leather treatment and have put on many miles in wet and rainy conditions. Much lighter than expected, which turned out to be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a Decent boot
customer_reviews.text: The boot was to wide & sloppy for may foot
customer_reviews.author: Smoky

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot.  Good for short day hikes.  More for fashion than function...
customer_reviews.text: Boots are ready to wear. Really no break in required. Hiked 7 miles out of the box. Comfortable with support from toe to ankle. From arch to toe felt some of the rocks through the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S Jennings

customer_reviews.text: Im a 10.5 and had to get 11. Nice fit
customer_reviews.author: Guinel gue

customer_reviews.title: The fit of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I sent them back as they were not the width I needed.
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit just like most other Merrells. Definitely not quite as rugged as some of their other boots, but that’s what I was looking for. Great for traveling, hiking and walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Vicars

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Merrill’s fit me really well, and these are no exception; maybe a little bit larger than usual, but perfect for wool socks!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bruehl

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: The only dislikes I have are that the material on the upper is thin and digs into my heel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, relatively light hikers; good flexibility; so far have passed the water resistant measure (unlike most Merrill's).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boots you can use immediately
customer_reviews.text: Boots, very comfortable and fit perfectly. Bought a second pair a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E. Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fall/winter hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Comfy on hikes. No hot spots. Water proof tested and passed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size different than I bought in a store
customer_reviews.text: Returned for a different size. Ordered same size as I currently own and they were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: solid walking boots
customer_reviews.text: great boots! would not recommend for serious hiking, but for walking around all day on city streets or moderate trails. wear them all day and my feet feel fine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Holdridge

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Took them on 1 hike: they are not waterproof as advertised, and the toe tip started peeling off on the right boot from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Max Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Ordered a half size larger than normal and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of hiking boots! So glad I purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Went on one short hike in Cave Creek and they felt great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keough

customer_reviews.title: Merrell quality
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on Merrellto provide boots that fit, last and look great. While other companies like Danner get worse and continue to let their quality slip, Merrel keeps getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Ontario Mid Wp Boat Shoe
feature_bullets: Merrell Kinetic Fit BASE removable contoured footbed for flexible support
